fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the value of the checkbox should change.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color to use when this checkbox is checked.

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoCheckbox.fillColor} The color used to fill this checkbox.

fields.name: inactiveColor
fields.desc: The color used if the checkbox is inactive.

fields.name: checkColor
fields.desc: The color to use for the check icon when this checkbox is checked.

fields.name: tristate
fields.desc: If true, the checkbox's [value] can be true, false, or null.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the checkbox's border shadow when it has the input focus.

fields.name: side
fields.desc: The color and width of the checkbox's border.

fields.name: semanticLabel
fields.desc: The semantic label for the checkbox that will be announced by screen readers.

nodes.name: CupertinoCheckbox Usage
desc: 【inactiveColor】: Border color when inactive/background color when disabled   【Color?】
When onChanged is null, it means it is disabled.

nodes.name: CupertinoCheckbox Three States
desc: In three states, the value is null for -
